amendment.description: To provide for the expansion of participating eligible foreign states under the Open World Leadership program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3666 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3666 proposed by Senator Campbell for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S9423; text: CR S9423) To provide for the expansion of participating eligible foreign states under the Open World Leadership program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3666 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3666 proposed by Senator Campbell for Senator Stevens.
